name: 2nd Global Summit and Expo on Robot Intelligence Technology and Applications
content: Dear Colleagues, It is a great pleasure to announce that The Scientistt will host the 2nd Global Summit and Expo on Robot Intelligence Technology and Applications (GSERITA2022) will be held in Barcelona, Spain during September 19-21, 2022\. GSERITA2022 aims to bring together the renowned researchers, scientists and scholars to exchange ideas, to present sophisticated research works and to discuss hot topics in the field and share their experiences on all aspects of Robot Intelligence Technology and Applications. The GSERITA2022 will be a 3 days event that means to gather the key players of the Robot Intelligence and Technology community and related sectors. This event is launched with the aims to become an established event, attracting global participants, intent on sharing, exchanging and exploring new avenues of Intelligence Systems, technologies and applications. A wide-ranging scientific program consisting of plenary lectures, keynote lectures, Invited lectures, parallel sessions, as well as poster sessions for young scientists covering all topics in Intelligence Systems, technologies and applications will be scheduled. This conference provides a wonderful opportunity for you to enhance your knowledge about the newest interdisciplinary approaches in Intelligence Systems, technologies and applications. Moreover, the conference offers a valuable platform to create new contacts in the field of Intelligence Systems, technologies and applications, by providing valuable networking time for you to meet great personnel in the field. We look forward to seeing you at GSERITA2022 in Barcelona, Spain.
